meanings.definition: An agreement or contract between two or more parties.
meanings.sent1: The covenant between friends was to always support each other.
meanings.sent2: The business partners signed a covenant to outline their responsibilities.
meanings.sent3: The covenant to always share snacks led to a lot of happy moments.
meanings.sent4: Their covenant was as strong as steel, unbreakable and enduring.
meanings.sent5: The covenant to protect the environment was embraced by the whole community.

meanings.sent1: She made a covenant to always be there for her sister.
meanings.sent2: His covenant to donate a portion of his earnings to charity was admirable.
meanings.sent3: The covenant to never eat ice cream again lasted only a day.
meanings.sent4: Their love was a covenant, unspoken yet deeply felt.
meanings.sent5: The covenant to always tell the truth was put to the test that day.

meanings.definition: A formal, solemn, and binding agreement.
meanings.sent1: The nations entered into a covenant to maintain peace in the region.
meanings.sent2: The covenant between the two families was sealed with a handshake.
meanings.sent3: The covenant to always wear matching socks was taken very seriously.
meanings.sent4: Their covenant was like a fortress, protecting them from harm.
meanings.sent5: The covenant to never reveal their secret was upheld for years.
